items.title: npm audit vulnerabilities (moderate)
items.description: npm audit reports moderate vulnerabilities in ai, esbuild, vite, @vitejs/plugin-react packages
items.suggestedFix: Run npm audit fix or update affected packages. Some fixes require @mastra/core update.

items.title: server/src/index.ts is 738 lines - needs splitting
items.description: Main server entry point has grown too large with all routes defined inline. Should be split into route modules.
items.suggestedFix: Split routes into separate files: routes/player.ts, routes/quests.ts, routes/health.ts, routes/content.ts, routes/seasons.ts
items.resolution: Routes split into separate modules. index.ts now 600 lines.

items.title: quest.ts service is 1050 lines - needs splitting
items.description: Quest service has grown to 1050 lines (was 658) and handles too many responsibilities: quest creation, completion, reset, rotating quests, weekly quests
items.suggestedFix: Split into quest-core.ts (creation/evaluation), quest-daily.ts (daily logic), quest-completion.ts (completion/XP)

items.title: TODO: Integrate with push notification service
items.description: Notification service has placeholder for push notifications
items.codeSnippet: // TODO: Integrate with push notification service
items.suggestedFix: Integrate with web push API or service like Firebase Cloud Messaging

items.title: TODO - Implement Mastra AI narrator
items.description: Mastra integration file is a placeholder
items.codeSnippet: // TODO: Implement Mastra AI narrator agent
items.suggestedFix: Implement AI narrator using Mastra SDK
items.resolution: Mastra narrator agent implemented with Anthropic integration

items.title: TODO - Add debuff status to player data
items.description: Dashboard has hardcoded debuffActive: false
items.codeSnippet: debuffActive: false, // TODO: Add debuff status to player data
items.suggestedFix: Fetch debuff status from API and display in dashboard

items.title: 168 console.log/error/warn statements in production code
items.description: 168 console statements across 24 files. Should use structured logging with log levels.
items.codeSnippet: console.log, console.error in server/src/routes, server/src/services, etc.
items.suggestedFix: Implement proper logging library (pino, winston) with log levels and structured output

items.title: React 18 to React 19 upgrade available
items.description: react and react-dom can be upgraded from 18.3.1 to 19.x
items.suggestedFix: Test and upgrade to React 19 for improved performance and features

items.title: Vite major upgrade available
items.description: vite can be upgraded from 5.x to 7.x
items.suggestedFix: Test and upgrade Vite for improved build performance

items.description: drizzle-orm and drizzle-kit have updates available
items.suggestedFix: Review changelog and upgrade Drizzle packages

items.title: Tailwind CSS 3 to 4 upgrade available
items.description: tailwindcss can be upgraded from 3.x to 4.x
items.suggestedFix: Review Tailwind v4 migration guide and upgrade

items.title: framer-motion major upgrade available
items.description: framer-motion has a major version upgrade available
items.suggestedFix: Review changelog and upgrade

items.title: react-router-dom major upgrade available
items.description: react-router-dom has a major version upgrade available
items.suggestedFix: Review migration guide and upgrade

items.title: zod major upgrade available
items.description: zod has a major version upgrade available
items.suggestedFix: Review migration guide and upgrade

items.title: @paralleldrive/cuid2 upgrade available
items.description: cuid2 has a major version upgrade available
items.suggestedFix: Review changelog and upgrade

items.title: @types/node upgrade available
items.description: Node.js types have major update
items.suggestedFix: Upgrade types to match Node.js version in use

items.title: @types/react upgrade available
items.description: React types need upgrade to match React 19
items.suggestedFix: Upgrade alongside React 19 migration

items.title: @vitejs/plugin-react upgrade available
items.description: Vite React plugin needs upgrade alongside Vite
items.suggestedFix: Upgrade alongside Vite migration

items.title: Debug logging of connection string
items.description: Database connection string was logged to console
items.suggestedFix: Remove or guard this log statement to prevent credential exposure

items.title: Hardcoded localhost URLs with fallbacks
items.description: Multiple files have localhost:3000 and localhost:5173 hardcoded as fallbacks
items.suggestedFix: Consider centralized config module, ensure env vars are always set in deployment

items.title: @types/react-dom upgrade available
items.description: React DOM types need upgrade to match React 19
items.suggestedFix: Upgrade alongside React 19 migration

items.title: Zero test coverage across entire codebase
items.description: Project had 0 test files initially.
items.suggestedFix: Set up testing infrastructure (vitest/jest) and prioritize critical path tests
items.resolution: Set up vitest for server and web packages. Added 13 test files with 200+ tests.

items.title: dungeon.ts service untested (741 lines)
items.description: Largest service file with complex dungeon/boss battle logic
items.suggestedFix: Add unit tests for dungeon generation, boss battles, and completion logic

items.title: boss.ts service untested (711 lines)
items.description: Boss battle mechanics and scoring logic
items.suggestedFix: Add unit tests for boss challenge generation, score calculation, and rewards

items.title: quest.ts service partially tested (1050 lines)
items.description: Core business logic for daily/weekly quests - largest service
items.suggestedFix: Expand test coverage for completion, reset, and rotating quest logic
items.resolution: Added quest.test.ts with 19 tests for evaluateRequirement

items.title: narrative.ts service tested
items.description: AI narrative generation service
items.suggestedFix: Coverage added

items.title: shadow.ts service tested
items.description: Shadow observation game mechanics
items.suggestedFix: Coverage added
items.resolution: Added 24 tests for shadow types and mechanics

items.title: Only 1 of 7 API routes have integration tests
items.description: 7 route files but only player.ts has tests. Missing: content, guilds, health, notifications, quests, seasons
items.suggestedFix: Add integration tests for remaining route modules

items.title: React components partially tested
items.description: 3 component test files exist (StatCard, QuestCard, SystemMessage), but many components untested
items.suggestedFix: Add component tests for critical UI components
items.resolution: Added tests for core components. Additional coverage can be added incrementally.

items.title: Custom hooks partially tested
items.description: 2 hook test files (useDayStatus, useQuests), but 4 other hooks untested
items.suggestedFix: Add hook tests for useAuth, useXPTimeline, useNarrative, usePlayer, useShadow, useUnlocks
items.resolution: Core hooks tested. Additional coverage can be added incrementally.

items.title: 13 services without test coverage (~4,700 lines)
items.description: Services lacking tests: daily-log (399), debuff (186), guild (440), health (340), leaderboard (495), notification (295), progression (375), return-protocol (325), rotating-quest (562), season (445), title (423), weekly-quest (408), xp (458)
items.suggestedFix: Prioritize tests for xp.ts, rotating-quest.ts, leaderboard.ts, season.ts, guild.ts

items.title: 1 'any' type usage in production code
items.description: activateQuest function returns Promise<{ quest: any; message: string }>
items.codeSnippet: async function activateQuest(templateId: string): Promise<{ quest: any; message: string }>
items.suggestedFix: Create proper Quest type and use it instead of any

items.title: 6 services exceed 500 lines
items.description: Large services: quest.ts (1050), dungeon.ts (741), boss.ts (711), narrative.ts (595), rotating-quest.ts (562), shadow.ts (560)
items.suggestedFix: Consider splitting quest.ts and other large services into focused modules

items.title: streak.ts and level.ts have test coverage
items.description: These core utility services have tests
items.suggestedFix: N/A - already tested

items.title: localhost fallbacks acceptable for development
items.description: 5 files have localhost fallbacks for FRONTEND_URL and BETTER_AUTH_URL
items.suggestedFix: Acceptable for development, ensure env vars set in production
